rules.fullName: Opportunity - Commercial Record Type - Update
rules.description: Updates Business field on Opportunity to be Commercial for reporting

rules.fullName: Opportunity - 15 5 0 days before and after close date - Email
rules.description: Email notification to Oppty Owner when the close date is in 15, 5, 0 days before and after

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Big Deal A%26E Alert - Email
rules.description: Notify users when rule criteria are met.

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Big Deal Alert - Email
rules.description: Notify users when rule criteria are met.

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Big Deal Loss Alert - Email
rules.description: Notify users when rule criteria are met.

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Blue Sheet Reviewed by Manager - Email
rules.description: When the manager review date changes an email notification is sent to the Oppty owner.

rules.fullName: Opportunity - CF Win Wire - Email
rules.description: Commercial Fitness opportunity Win WIre

rules.fullName: Opportunity - CF opportunity Lost - Email
rules.description: Commercial Fitness opportunity lost

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Closed Lost Product Feedback - Email
rules.description: Email notification to gather product feedback for closed lost opportunities
rules.formula: AND( IF(ISCHANGED(Automation_Control__c), IF(CONTAINS(Automation_Control_Type__c, "Workflow"), FALSE,TRUE),TRUE), ISCHANGED(StageName), ISPICKVAL(StageName, "Closed Lost"), OR( ISPICKVAL(Reason_Lost__c, "Product Assortment did not meet customer needs"), ISPICKVAL(Reason_Lost__c, "Price offered did not meet customer perception of value") ) )

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Closing in 15 days - Email
rules.description: Email notification to Oppty Owner when the close date is in 15 days

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Funnel Score Total Populates - Update
rules.description: Funnel Scorecard Total will populate in this field for History Tracking.

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Home Services Record Type - Update
rules.description: Updates Business field on Opportunity to be Home Services for reporting
rules.formula: AND( IF(ISCHANGED(Automation_Control__c), IF(CONTAINS(Automation_Control_Type__c, "Workflow"), FALSE,TRUE),TRUE), CONTAINS(RecordType.DeveloperName, "Home Services") )

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Map Estimated Opportunity Amount - Update Field
Opportunity - Next Steps Last Updated - Update
rules.description: ISCHANGED (Next Steps) = True

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Notification for Closed Opportunities - Email
rules.formula: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Deal Closure/Won'), ISPICKVAL(StageName, 'Closed Lost') ), Owner.Profile.Name = 'Standard Inside Sales User' )

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Notify PM of Stage Change - Email
rules.description: Used to notify BIT/Program Manager when AM changes the Opportunity Stage

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Place in the Funnel 1-49 Universe - Update
rules.description: When the Funnel Scorecard Total is 1 - 49 Place in the Funnel = Universe
rules.formula: AND( IF(ISCHANGED(Automation_Control__c), IF(CONTAINS(Automation_Control_Type__c, "Workflow"), FALSE,TRUE),TRUE), ISCHANGED(Funnel_Scorecard_Total__c), Funnel_Scorecard_Total__c >= 1, Funnel_Scorecard_Total__c <= 49 )

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Place in the Funnel 50-59 Above the Funnel - Update
rules.formula: AND( IF(ISCHANGED(Automation_Control__c), IF(CONTAINS(Automation_Control_Type__c, "Workflow"), FALSE,TRUE),TRUE), ISCHANGED(Funnel_Scorecard_Total__c), Funnel_Scorecard_Total__c >= 50, Funnel_Scorecard_Total__c <= 59 )

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Place in the Funnel 60 - 79 - Update
rules.formula: AND( IF(ISCHANGED(Automation_Control__c), IF(CONTAINS(Automation_Control_Type__c, "Workflow"), FALSE,TRUE),TRUE), ISCHANGED(Funnel_Scorecard_Total__c), Funnel_Scorecard_Total__c >= 60, Funnel_Scorecard_Total__c <= 79 )

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Place in the Funnel 80-100 - Update
rules.formula: AND( IF(ISCHANGED(Automation_Control__c), IF(CONTAINS(Automation_Control_Type__c, "Workflow"), FALSE,TRUE),TRUE), ISCHANGED(Funnel_Scorecard_Total__c), Funnel_Scorecard_Total__c >= 80 )

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Populate Managers Email - Update
rules.description: Populates the Users Managers Email address in order to send notifications to Managers

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Roll-up Retail Status%5CContacting Customer in Roll-up - Update
rules.description: Roll-up Status based on Stage
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( StageName ), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Identification"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Conduct Due Diligence"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Review Customer Requirements"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Determine Solution")))

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Roll-up Retail Status%5CCustomer Rejects Proposal - Update
rules.description: Roll-up Status based on Stage
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( StageName ), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Lost")))

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Roll-up Retail Status%5CNegotiating with Customer - Update
rules.description: Roll-up Status based on Stage
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( StageName ), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Develop/Review Pricing Model"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Finance Review"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Develop Proposal"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Proposal Presentation"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Solution Discussion and Negotiation"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Contract Preparation and Negotiation"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Legal Approval"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Financial Approval")))

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Roll-up Retail Status%5CSale Completed - Update
rules.description: Roll-up Status based on Stage
rules.formula: AND( ISCHANGED( StageName ), OR( ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Deal Closure/Won")))

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Roll-up Stage%5CClosing - Update
rules.description: Stage = Legal Approval, Financial Approval, Deal Closure Won, Deal Closed Lost; Sales Process = Closing

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Roll-up Stage%5CDeveloping - Update
rules.description: Stage = Develop Proposal, Proposal Presentation; Sales Process = Developing

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Roll-up Stage%5CNegotiating - Update

criteriaItems.value: Contract Preparation and Negotiation,Solution Discussion and Negotiation

rules.description: Stage = Solution Discussion and Negotiation, Contact Preparation and Negotiation; Sales Process = Negotiating

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Roll-up Stage%5CProspecting - Update
rules.description: Stage = Identification, Conduct Due Diligence, Review Customer Requirements; Sales Process = Prospecting

rules.fullName: Opportunity - Roll-up Stage%5CQualifying - Update
rules.description: Stage=Determine Solution, Develop/Review Pricing Model, Finance Review; Sales Process = Qualifying

rules.fullName: Opportunity Closed
rules.formula: OR( AND( Owner.UserRole.Name = "National Segment Manager", Owner.UserRole.Name = "SA Region, Strategic Accounts", Owner.UserRole.Name = "Sears Administrator", Owner.UserRole.Name = "West Region, Central", Owner.UserRole.Name = "East Region, South East - SR"), ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Won"))

rules.fullName: Opportunity Created
rules.formula: OR( CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "National Segment Manager", CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "SA Region, Strategic Accounts", CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "Sears Administrator", CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "West Region, Central - SR", CreatedBy.UserRole.Name = "East Region, South East - SR")

rules.fullName: Opportunity Created Task

tasks.subject: Determine Method of Payment and review Commercial One Application requirements with customer (where appropriate)
